posts.post_content:
Here are a few T206 I would be willing to trade for any T206 AB's or T3's. If interested please email me at [url]andrewhahn55@gmail.com[/url]. Payment can be made by check/mo or paypal gift/money owed. 

Sorry for the gigantic scans as I don't know how to make them smaller.
* update to include sale price since there were no trades *

Thanks, Andrew  to ebay

Doyle SGC 30 Cycle 460 
Barbeau GAI 2 American Beauty
Devore SGC 20 American Beauty
